response.overview: El Pescador is an intimate portrait of the Caribbean through the lives of those who devote themselves to the sea. From the voice of a Puerto Rican fisherman to the bond between a father and his son in Colombia, the film reveals how fishing both unites and distinguishes, portraying a legacy shaped by tradition, struggle, and hope. Filmed in La Parguera, Lajas, Puerto Rico and Palomino, La Guajira, Colombia.
response.tagline: An intimate portrait of the Caribbean through the lives of those who devote themselves to the sea.
response.title: El Pescador
